Package solidstack.io

Interface Summary
EncodingDetector Detects the character encoding from the first line.
SourceReader A source reader.
 

Class Summary
BufferedResource A resource that remembers the original resource so that BufferedResource.resolve(String) and BufferedResource.getLastModified() keep working.
ByteMatrixInputStream An input stream that reads from a 2-dimensional byte array.
ByteMatrixOutputStream An output stream that writes the data into a two dimensional byte array.
ClassPathResource A resource that is located on the classpath.
DeferringWriter A writer that does not write to the given resource until a certain threshold is reached.
FileResource A file resource.
InputStreamResource An input stream resource.
MemoryResource A memory resource.
NonClosingInputStream An InputStream wrapper that will ignore the call to close().
NonClosingOutputStream An OutputStream wrapper that will ignore the call to close().
PushbackReader My own PushbackReader.
RandomAccessSourceReader A source reader that can be repositioned with RandomAccessSourceReader.gotoLine(int).
ReaderSourceReader A source reader that reads from a reader.
Resource Represents a resource.
Resources A factory to create resources.
SegmentedInputStream Divides an input stream into multiple segments.
SegmentedReader Divides an reader into multiple segments.
SourceLocation A location in a resource.
SourceReaders A factory for source readers.
StringResource A string resource.
SystemInOutResource An input stream resource.
URIResource A resource identified by a URI.
 

Exception Summary
FatalIOException A RuntimeException to indicate that something has gone wrong with the IO.
FatalURISyntaxException A RuntimeException to indicate that something has gone wrong with the URI syntax.
SourceException Represents a problem in the source file.
